text: The Sweden Box Open was an international amateur boxing event in Sweden. It was held between 1980 and 1997 The event was often held in January. It was usually held in Stockholm as the Stockholm Box Open. The 1995 and 1996 editions were held in Sundsvall and Timr√•. The event was one of the major amateur boxing competitions in Europe. ==References== Category:1980 establishments in Sweden Category:1997 disestablishments in Sweden Category:Boxing Category:Sport in Stockholm Category:Sundsvall
title: Sweden Box Open
